page.title: 14DINGLE FARM FERT.PEST CONT.
page.content:
{Fertilisers}in various quantities are added to feed the land. Some used are Nitrogen, Phosphate, Potash,Waste Lime to correct acidity, Seaweed ground down and used in liquid form and ordinary farmyard manure.
{Pest Control- Sugar-beet, corn and potatoes are pest free. Peas are sprayed for pea moth. Crops subject to aphids are sprayed with Pyrethrum in hot weather. Rotation of crops keeps slugs away.
{Weeds}are controlled by spraying. Sugar-beet is sprayed five times and corn, potatoes and peas are sprayed once.
